title: Collateral Solutions Oy
subtitle: Web Designer / Co-Founder
description: Collateral Solutions Oy is a startup best known for Evoir, a product for real estate investors. My most important contributions included choosing many of the key technologies and tools used and designing the overall architecture of the product. I also designed most of the user interface, contributed to marketing decisions and wrote much of the front-end code of the product. My initiative also led to, for example, choosing the workplace healthcare provider and the logo designer.

title: Anders Innovations Oy
subtitle: Junior UI/UX Designer
description: During my time at Anders I familiarized myself with accessibility evaluation and UX/UI design tools such as Hotjar and Sketch. However, most of my time was spent developing React applications in various teams and projects.

title: Neuro Event Labs Oy
subtitle: Trainee / Junior Developer
description: I worked as a part-time software developer during the winter and full-time during the summer. My responsibilities included taking care of the company website, a static site generated with Hugo. I also performed code review (Angular) and worked on my bachelor's thesis (UI design).

title: Intopalo Oy
subtitle: Software Developer Trainee
description: I learned the basics of web development from scratch, built the original Neuro Event Labs website and participated in various meetings concerning marketing and leadership in a self-managing organization.

title: Mepu Oy
subtitle: Summer Worker
description: My responsibilities included putting together dryer cells and inventorying the warehouse.

title: Tampere University
subtitle: Master of Science (Tech.)
description: My master's degree studies focused on human-technology interaction and industrial engineering. Still in positions of trust in various clubs and societies!

title: Kasetsart University
subtitle: Exchange
description: I spent spring 2020 as an exhange student in Kasetsart University, Thailand. I studied Thai language and familiarized myself with Asian culture. I also took a course in game development.

title: Tampere University
subtitle: Bachelor of Science (Tech.)
description: I majored in biomedical engineering and minored in software systems. You can find my bachelor's thesis (UI design in medical context) under the projects page of this website. During my studies I have also held positions of trust in various clubs and societies.

title: S채kyl채n Seudun Lukio
subtitle: High School Education
description: I attended S채kyl채n Seudun Lukio and took eight matriculation examinations. I received the best possible grade from two exams, with second best grades from four others.

title: StaticCharge
subtitle: Freelancer
description: In 2017 I realized that there was demand for my skills for short-term projects. I founded StaticCharge, a company specializing in static websites with content management systems and other web development projects.
